summary.body: Motivated Computer Science student and entry-level Full-Stack Developer with a solid programming foundation gained through intensive academic training. Skilled in designing and implementing responsive, user-focused web applications using modern technologies such as React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Next.js. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering high-performance, intuitive user interfaces. Currently seeking an internship opportunity to apply and expand my technical skills in a real-world development environment.

projects.title: E-Commerce Full Stack Website
description: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform featuring admin product management and a dynamic shopping cart.
Implemented secure user authentication and role-based access control with encrypted passwords and session management.
Developed scalable RESTful API endpoints for handling products, orders, and user profiles.
Designed a responsive, intuitive user interface using Tailwind CSS for seamless cross-device experience.
Launched an admin dashboard to simplify product and order oversight.

projects.title: Social Media API
description: Developed a scalable backend system for a social media platform with support for posts, likes, comments, and user profiles.
Implemented secure JWT-based authentication and role-based access control for users and administrators.
Integrated Cloudinary for optimized image uploads and storage within posts.
Built admin-specific endpoints to manage users and handle reported content.

projects.title: Movie Details Site
description: Developed a dynamic platform for browsing movie data, including trailers, cast details, ratings, and posters retrieved from a live API.
Integrated external API to display currently playing movies in real-time on the homepage.
Implemented a responsive search feature to allow users to locate specific titles efficiently.
Designed a fully responsive and accessible UI using Tailwind CSS for optimal cross-device experience.
Calculated and displayed real-time average movie ratings to support informed viewing choices.

Built several web applications, most notably: a full-stack e-commerce platform, a front-end movie information website integrated with the TMDB API, and a back-end RESTful social media API â€” all developed through independent learning and hands-on practice.
Applied modern technologies such as Next.js, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and Redis to create high-performance solutions.
Managed the complete development lifecycle, including planning, UI/UX design, implementation, testing, and deployment using platforms like Vercel and Railway.
